data.name: Hyper Galactica Demo
data.detailed_description:
Spaceships fights in galaxies - Demo

In preview, discover the demo of the game before the finalization of the complete game. In levels of game, your spaceship has to destroy, with your missiles, all the enemies coming from other galaxies before they invade our Planet. Watch out for their stealth spaceships, but also planets, black holes, asteroids, magnetic fields, stars, ...!

Game of increasing difficulty across 12 galaxies, one per level of play.

This game can be played alone, with friends or family, choosing from 7 avatars: the same match can be done with up to 7 players, on the same computer.

The interactive menu, the exit of the game, the choice of an avatar, the setting and the pause are always carried out with your keyboard.

However, you can play every part of the game with a joystick (XBOX, ...) or a keyboard (QWERTY, QWERTY):
- If you have connected a controller, all the main functions of the game such as moving a spaceship, firing a missile, ... during a game action are entirely performed by your controller.
- If you have not connected a controller, your keyboard will allow you to access these same functions of the game.

Now, it's up to you to discover all the facets of the game!
